title: Where did GS Esports go?
body:
Hi Community
I‘m a great Galatasaray fan and like watching their football games. Once I heard that they have or had an Esports Team. Wth happened to them? They’re gone but where? Thx for your help.

replies.body:
https://lol.gamepedia.com/Galatasaray_Esports

"Team has Disbanded."
"July (approx.), team disbands."

Sorry to be the bearer of bad news. :(
Oh no. But thx for your answer!
